articles.author: Kevin Liptak
articles.title: Trump finds kindred European spirit in Meloni - CNN
articles.description: It took Italy’s Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni exactly two sentences in the Oval Office on Thursday to signal to her host she was a kindred spirit.
articles.content:
It took Italys Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni exactly two sentences in the Oval Office on Thursday to signal to her host she was a kindred spirit.
